Cyber Claw:




Cyber Claw stared at the hallway out from the open door. Instead of bolting 
immediately, she just stood there, frozen. It was nearly stupid to do so. 
She left herself open. Her arms and legs were frozen. She had never done 
that before. Her instincts, mainly when she was trapped by Megatron told her 
to run. But, no, she just stood there like an idiot. And Dinobot and 
Tavatron were still with her in the room.

Her mind was going through. The Maximal hadn't even answered her about 
Megatron. She was so tensed that the picture of the tyrant in her head made 
the short spikes under her feet thrust out and dig into the floor. She had 
to move her feet with the movement of it. Her growled out into the hallway.

All that was left in her mind was Megatron.


>From: Yanshosh@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Wed, 14 Jun 2000 14:49:31 EDT
>
>::Ramulus/Striker::
>
>Ramulus walks up to Shadow Cat and Snow Tech from behind.
>
>"Welcome," he says, seeing and hearing that they are maximals, "I am 
>Ramulus."
>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>Striker recieves the transmission from DarkMouse and frowns. He looks at
>Cyber Claw.
>
>"You do not have to join us. We are maximals, we are not going to hold you 
>by
>force. If you would exuse me..."
>
>With that, he walks out of the room, leaving the door open if Cyber Claw
>wanted to leave. He emerges from the Ark, looking at DarkMouse and Suukie.
>
>He walks up to DarkMouse in time to see Suukie walk off.
>
>"He'll get himself killed!" he says to himself, running off after Suukie.
